name: 1688 直接聊天测试
description: 测试直接跳转到聊天页面是否会被风控拦截

config.script: console.log('🔍 检查1688聊天页面状态...'); const pageTitle = document.title; const pageUrl = window.location.href; const isChatPage = pageUrl.includes('air.1688.com') && pageUrl.includes('im'); const hasInput = document.querySelector('div[contenteditable], textarea, input[type="text"]'); const isVerification = pageTitle.includes('验证码') || document.body.textContent.includes('验证码') || document.body.textContent.includes('verification'); console.log('页面标题:', pageTitle); console.log('当前URL:', pageUrl); console.log('是否为聊天页面:', isChatPage); console.log('是否有输入框:', !!hasInput); console.log('是否被验证码拦截:', isVerification); return { success: isChatPage && !isVerification, pageTitle, pageUrl, isChatPage, hasInput: !!hasInput, isVerification, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
